籤詩版本二:
A na-enyefe nwa nwa ezi omume site n'aka nna gaa n'ọkpara, ọganiihu na nri na uwe na-adabere naanị na Chineke.
Chunxuan na ụlọ nzukọ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ nwee obi ụtọ, mgbe agụụ na-agụ, nri, akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ na ụra, Chunxuan bụ ihe atụ maka ndị nne na nna.
詩意:
Ejikọtara hexagram a na ihe oyiyi achara na-eduga na mmiri.
Atụrụ anya na ihe niile ga-aga nke ọma.
解曰: Were achara wee duru mmiri. Ọ na-agbasa agwụghị agwụ. Nwa amadi na-achọ olile anya. Ha niile nwere obi ụtọ.
籤詩故事一:
◇Eze Wu nke Zhou rịgoro n'ocheeze
Eze Wu nke Zhou wakporo eze Zhou ma duru nnù ndi-isi nari asatọ ka ha buso ndi-agha eze Shang agha, ndi-agha nọ na Chaoge (isi obodo eze Shang) we chigharia megide eze Shang ma rara eze Shang rara.
Eze Zhou gbara onwe ya ọkụ n'ụlọ elu Zhaixing, ma bibie usoro ndị eze Shang.
Eze Wu we nara akwukwọ ọla-edo na àkù ọla-edo, nke bu oche-eze nke eze, chere iru n'ebe ndida, chikọta aka-ya abua, we nọdu ala ziri ezi. Eze Wu nyere iwu ka e kesaa ala Lutai, ka a kwatuo ụlọ elu Star Picking, na ekesa ọka osikapa echekwara na Juqiao.
Hapụ Jizi a tụrụ mkpọrọ ma rụkwaa ili Bign. Eze Wu gbagoro n'ọnụ ụzọ ụlọ onye amamihe Shang Rong wee rube isi. Na-asọpụrụ ndị ezi omume na ndị nwere omume ọma, ma hapụ ndị ohu nọ n'ime ụlọ.
Ọ kwụsịrị ngwa agha ma kwalite omenala na agụmakwụkwọ. N'ebe ndịda Nanshan, a na-ata ịnyịnya na-ata nri, a na-ejikwa osisi peach na-ata ehi n'ime ime obodo, ọ bụ ebe udo dị.
聖意: Ụlọ ahụ adịghị mma (jisie ọma), ị nwere ike ime ọchịchọ nke gị (jisie gị ụtọ), chọọ ego, mee azụmahịa, na ịlụ di na nwunye (zute ezigbo ọgọ nwoke), Liujia enweghị nchebe (zodiac). akara), ndị ji ụkwụ aga n’ubi, silkworm na-enwe ihu ọma, anụmanụ isii mebiri emebi, ndị mmadụ na-esi ike ịchọta (lee) ikpe ọha, onye ama ama na-akwagharị, chi ọma na-efunahụ ọrịa na ọrịa.
古人: Eze Wu nke Zhou rịgoro n'ocheeze
第X籤: Iri ise na ise na-emeri lọtrị (nza)
